On 9/24/02 8:14 AM, "sfranklinuk2002" <aca99sf@...> wrote:

> I now need to simulate the users entry at the keyboard in a test
> case, this needs to be done,

Does it REALLY have to be done this way?

> by the test class listening to the
> System.in channel, but i cant figure out how to get a test class to
> write to this chanel - to simulate the user input
> 

Providing that the class has to ask for input, instead of having it respond
to events from the UI, have it ask through an interface which you can stub
out in your test, inputting whatever you want. The production implementation
of this interface would use System.in.
